call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - December 19th 2024

decisions.decision: Named the Cornell architecture/planning/art department token 'BRICK'
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Discussion around IT table about best name for LETS token
decisions.quote: We had a discussion about it around the IT table here about what would be the best name to name this token for an architecture, city planning and art department combined and the idea I guess was BRICK

decisions.decision: Completed multisig transaction from old Sigmanauts multisig to new multisig
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Moving Sigmanauts funds to new infrastructure
decisions.quote: we got our multisig transaction from the old multisig for the Sigmanauts to the new multisig for the Sigmanauts

commitments.commitment: New node release candidate this week
commitments.quote: there will be a new release candidate this week

commitments.commitment: Node release after testing around Saturday
commitments.quote: after some testing, so it will be under testing for like a few days and then, yeah, we will be released maybe around Saturday
Sigma interpreter release next week, probably
starting from, I don't know, maybe next week even. So we can have regular discussions on sub-blocks

commitments.commitment: Do new videos after New Year
commitments.quote: probably after New Year, we'll do new videos

commitments.commitment: Visit consensus conference in Hong Kong
commitments.quote: I think we'll visit consensus conference in Hong Kong also

commitments.commitment: Art event talk will be released after 21st
commitments.quote: I recorded the talk so it will be released after 21st

open_questions.question: When Ledger audit will be completed
open_questions.context: Final conditions about audits need to be studied

open_questions.question: Whether to do meetups in Thailand, Vietnam or other locations
open_questions.context: Considering meetup possibilities in various Asian locations

key_facts.fact: Cornell printing system has about 65,000 rows in database over 4-5 years
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sold four Mac Pros on MewFinance for 65 ERGs each
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Node development finished rework and versioning in 6.0
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Kestrel has deterministic signature support done
key_facts.speaker: kushti
